name: Chris Tomlin Songs Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: "How great is our God ________ with me how great is our God." What is the missing word from "How Great is our God?"?
questions.explanation:
sing.

	Chris Tomlin's middle name is Dwayne. He was born May 4, 1972.

questions.text: Chris Tomlin sings a song called "Amazing Grace" but what is the parenthetical title?
questions.explanation:
My Chains are Gone.

	He was born in Grand Saline, Texas. He married Lauren Bricken in 2010.

questions.text: In "Whom Shall I Fear (God of Angel Armies)", what words go in the blanks of these lyrics: "You hear me when I call. You are my ___________________"?
questions.explanation:
morning song.

	He has sold over 29 million records. His first album was "Inside Your Love" in 1995.

questions.text: In the song "I Will Follow" how does he describe all of God's ways?
questions.explanation:
good.

	In 2001 he created the album "The Noise We Make". In 2002 he created the album "Not to Us".

questions.text: In the song "God's Dance Floor" complete these lyrics, "You'll never stop loving us. No matter how ____________." What three words go in the blanks?
questions.explanation:
far we run.

	The album "Burning Lights" was released in 2013. It includes the songs: "Awake My Soul" and "Jesus, Son of God".

questions.text: What is the song "Lord, I Need You" a modern version of?
options: A Mighty Fortress is Our God
questions.explanation:
I Need Thee Every Hour.

	The hymn, "I Need Thee Every Hour" was written by Robert Lowry. "Lord, I Need You" was written by Daniel Carson, Jesse Reeves, Kristian Stanfill, Matt Maher and Christy Nockels.

questions.text: What song are these lyrics from: "Shout your praise. Lift high the Name of Jesus. What's not to love about You"?
questions.explanation:
Sing, Sing, Sing.

	"Sing, Sing, Sing" is from his 2008 album "Hello Love". Chris Tomlin won the Dove Award for Male Vocalist of the Year for three consecutive years.

questions.text: In what song are we told, "God You wrestle a sinner's heart"?
questions.explanation:
Your Grace is Enough.

	"Your Grace is Enough" is on the 2004 album "Arriving". Tomlin not only tours but he also leads worship time at his home church, Passion City Church, in Atlanta.

questions.text: What word goes in the blank in "I Will Rise"? "I can say it is well. Jesus has overcome, and the ________ is overwhelmed."
questions.explanation:
grave.

	This song can also be found on his 2008 album "Hello Love". In an interview it was mentioned that speaker Louie Giglio often writes songs with Chris Tomlin. "I Will Rise" is one of them.

questions.text:
What word goes in the blank from his song "How Can I Keep from Singing"? "There is an endless song echoes in my soul I hear the music ring
And though the storms may come I am holding on to the rock I_________."
questions.explanation:
cling.

	This song is from the album "See the Morning" which came out in 2006. It also includes the songs "Glory in the Highest" and "Let Your Mercy Rain".
